title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new conceptual article on billing budgets and alerts, explaining usage tracking and controls.
Updated billing documentation to reference the new concept and restructured setup tutorial.
Added two new issue search filters: `has:label` and `no:project`.
Replaced deprecated `pages.github.com` links with updated references in GitHub Pages docs.
Added three new GuardSquare secret patterns and enabled push protection for Samsara tokens.
